dentalFollowup.name: dental_Followup
dentalFollowup.title: Dental Lab Follow up
dentalFollowup.sqlQuery: select DL.hims_f_dental_form_id,DL.odered_date,DL.work_status,DL.is_notify,DL.full_name,DL.patient_code,DL.procedure_id,PR.procedure_desc,DL.vendor_id,VN.vendor_name,USR.employee_id from hims_f_dental_form as DL inner join hims_d_vendor VN on VN.hims_d_vendor_id=DL.vendor_id inner join hims_d_procedure PR on PR.hims_d_procedure_id=DL.procedure_id inner join algaeh_d_app_user USR on USR.algaeh_d_app_user_id=DL.updated_by where DL.work_status ='WIP' and DL.is_notify = 0 and DATEDIFF(date(now()),date(DL.odered_date)) >= (select dental_lab_days from hims_d_inventory_options limit 1);
